subject: Big Brown (Race Horse)
Preakness Stakes
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Big Brown’s trainer says his colt is “even money” to sweep the Triple Crown, and at first glance his competitors at the Preakness Stakes hardly seem worthy of chasing a $1 million purse.
snippet: Big Brown’s trainer says his colt is “even money” to sweep the Triple Crown, and at first glance his competitors at the Preakness Stakes hardly seem worthy of chasing a $1 million purse.
